name: In your Shadow
description: "In your Shadow" is a Visual Novel that tells the story of three people: Lilly, Skyler, and Zachary. One night all of their lives change: Skyler is poisoned, Lilly is catfished, and Zachary gets a call that changes his life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3 Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: On board (integrated) graphics Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated sound card Additional Notes: May take a long time to launch.
